The idea here isnt to have a schizophrenic dialogue with an object that you think is speaking back to you. Suggesting and hinting what the design should be, rather than what I wanted it to be."

As designers, we would all do well to try to rekindle this connection  to foster it, let it inspire our work, and help us to recover a more conscious, heart-centered approach to design.
